title: Riot i demand an explanation
body: Hey Riot, i demanded an explanation.... as to why i am i keep getting punished for bad team mates? if all the hatters are gonna post "Another one who blames team mates forum" Then leave my forum plz :) For the past 30 games iv had 10 Afker's, about 5 games of pure feeders, and the rest are people not at my level. BIG SHOCKER IM CURRENTLY BRONZE! but my main account which got banned was Gold ;) i want to talk to a dev or someone who can fix my Queue because this is outrageous, I WILL continue to NOT FLAME but tell the truth !~

replies.body:
First of all, you admit your main was banned, let me guess, it was for excessive chat toxicity?

And let me guess, you "continu[ing] to NOT FLAME" is going to consist of you flaming more and repeatedly blaming your team for provoking you when in reality you were just too immature to shrug it off and mute them?

BIG SHOCKER Riot's under no obligation to fix anything for you when the issue is with your toxicity having your main account banned.

> [{quoted}](name=Chermorg,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=K8fgFcJu,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2017-06-13T16:54:17.347+0000)
>
> First of all, you admit your main was banned, let me guess, it was for excessive chat toxicity?
> 
> And let me guess, you "continu[ing] to NOT FLAME" is going to consist of you flaming more and repeatedly blaming your team for provoking you when in reality you were just too immature to shrug it off and mute them?
> 
> BIG SHOCKER Riot's under no obligation to fix anything for you when the issue is with your toxicity having your main account banned.

Yes i admit i was banned, i took a break from the game and tried to play slowly, i am not a toxic person anymore, i try not to be at least... But when 0/3 and ur fighting and say " i dont know what safe is" it kinda feels like.... Bad.... and riot does O me an explanation or reason to why am i being placed with people who are below the worst of the worst.

News flash, calling people "below worst of the worst" isn't really "trying to not be toxic".

Also news flash, you're free to uninstall and stop playing at any time. That's all Riot owes you, is the right to uninstall.
You think banning toxicity is ever the solution? well its not FYI ;)
I'm not sure how it's not the solution.. Preventing accounts that are overly toxic from accessing the game prevents them from accessing the game. Thus preventing disruption.

How good a player is is always objective.

Telling a 0/3 player they are bad ISN'T the truth.

L2 words.

> [{quoted}](name=Mig89,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=K8fgFcJu,comment-id=000600000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-06-14T17:45:10.981+0000)
>
> Well your bronze so you're bad too. Not toxic, just the truth

Doubt that.... iv been playing amazing past games... team just sucks
amazing in bronze is still bronze lul.
Just the other Bronzies ;)
Relax guys

>and riot does O me an explanation or reason to why am i being placed with people who are below the worst of the worst.  

They have the same elo as you

You demand riot to fix your queue? Well , you queue is fine. You are matched with and against people of your skill. Otherwise your KDA wouldnt be so bad and you wouldnt feed in half your games. You have 42% winrate with less than 2 KDA on most your champions averaging awful amount of CS

> [{quoted}](name=archerno1,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=K8fgFcJu,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-06-13T13:51:16.272+0000)
>
> You demand riot to fix your queue? Well , you queue is fine. You are matched with and against people of your skill. Otherwise your KDA wouldnt be so bad and you wouldnt feed in half your games. You have 42% winrate with less than 2 KDA on most your champions averaging awful amount of CS

Oh man? i thought i was toxic haha. But FYI! even i have bad games, and just think for a second Dummby :) if i keep getting feeders of course my win rate is less then 50% Haha that math should have been obv :)

> [{quoted}](name=Cyberfehore4011,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=K8fgFcJu,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-06-13T14:07:24.124+0000)
>
> Oh man? i thought i was toxic haha. But FYI! even i have bad games, and just think for a second Dummby :) if i keep getting feeders of course my win rate is less then 50% Haha that math should have been obv :)

Im not talking about 1 game. Im talking about overall performance

https://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=Cyberfehore4011

Look to the left champion list. 

You have 64 games on Gragas, 36% winrate and KDA of 1.94:1. Average score 6.3/8.2/9.6. 
You have 39 games on Viktor, 49% winrate and KDA of 1.79:1. Average score 7.1/8.8/8.7
You have 30 games on Riven, 37% winrate and KDA of 1.49:1. Average score 6.6/8.4/5.9 

That means with your 3 main champions, MOST of your games you have negative score

Now look at your CS score in recent history (note that average CS per 10 mins of a Gold player is 6.5). Your CS scores per 10 mins:

5, 4.4, 5.4, 3.8, 3.4, 5, 5.2, 4.4, 3, 4.6, 4.2, 5, 4.6, 2.9, 5, 3.9, 4.4, 4.1, 4.5, 4.4, 4.9, 3.8 and so on and on and on 

Thats YOUR personal performance. In your last 50+ games you passed 6 CS per 10 minutes mark ONLY ONCE

Another extremely important part of personal performance is warding. As a laner you should place 1 ward per 2 minutes on average. And around 5-6 Control wards in 20 + mins game. Lets see your stats: 

6 wards in 25 mins. Thats less than a half of what you should have placed
6 wards in 27 mins. Same as above.
14 wards in 44 mins. Again very low
11 wards in 31 min. A bit better but still low
10 wards in 32 min
7 wards in 20 min

ANd so on. Again, your warding count is extremely low and u are barely even buying control wards. 

So if we just look at your personal performance we get this: Negative score in most games, low CS, low warding.

So yes, while some games of yours are lost due to your teammates,  your PERSONAL performance in vast majority of your games is extremely low(for someone who claims that he was gold). I am not saying that u are worst in your games, you are not obviously, but u are exactly where you belong with your stats.

Also, i dont think warding it that important in bronze :) isave my wards for when they are running  into a bush so i have VISION, something u would know ;) Also i can handle ganks well, ik when to 2v1 or to run. But continue talking nonsense  ! please :)

> [{quoted}](name=Cyberfehore4011,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=K8fgFcJu,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2017-06-13T14:58:41.332+0000)
>
> Also, i dont think warding it that important in bronze :) isave my wards for when they are running  into a bush so i have VISION, something u would know ;) Also i can handle ganks well, ik when to 2v1 or to run. But continue talking nonsense  ! please :)

Take it however you want. Your climbing or descending doesnt affect my life at all. Ill survive if you stay in bronze. I just wanted to point out why you are there. Riot wont manually modify your MMR so only chance you have to climb is improving. Also you mentioned that i am butthurt? About what? Do you honestly believe that im suffering because u sit in bronze with 42% winrate?

I mean he pointed out areas you can work on.  Why would you practice a new champion in ranked? If you want to climb play something your good at otherwise you are where you belong your grag skills are at a bronze level

I mean, i got better at graggas, i learned real experience, real pressures, and now i can say for certain im a silver + graggas player, just from learning, watching videos/streamers, are real game practice.

> [{quoted}](name=Cyberfehore4011,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=K8fgFcJu,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-06-13T14:07:24.124+0000)
>
> Oh man? i thought i was toxic haha. But FYI! even i have bad games, and just think for a second Dummby :) if i keep getting feeders of course my win rate is less then 50% Haha that math should have been obv :)

If you're are intended to insult posters by calling them dumb, then perhaps you should proof read your posts.

Your visibility to Riot is pretty low here. The only way to guarantee talking to Riot is to make a support ticket.

That being said, your queue is fine. You are playing the same game as everybody else.

> [{quoted}](name=Zezockary,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=K8fgFcJu,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-06-13T13:55:38.465+0000)
>
> Your visibility to Riot is pretty low here. The only way to guarantee talking to Riot is to make a support ticket.
> 
> That being said, your queue is fine. You are playing the same game as everybody else.

It is not fine, I am the only one performing..... My team just feeds..... Look at the dmg charts, Yes my CS might not be the best, but my performance, my roaming capability, my laning phase are all on point, even i have started working to CS better.... I do blame myself, but when ur bot goes 0/15 it hits hard....

> [{quoted}](name=Cyberfehore4011,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=K8fgFcJu,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-06-13T14:09:12.015+0000)
>
> It is not fine, I am the only one performing..... My team just feeds..... Look at the dmg charts, Yes my CS might not be the best, but my performance, my roaming capability, my laning phase are all on point, even i have started working to CS better.... I do blame myself, but when ur bot goes 0/15 it hits hard....

I checked your match history , a lot of games lately. Could u point me one where your bot lane went 0/15?
Of course i can! Do u have a skype or something? i have in my last 20 GAMES 5 BOT LANES THAT DID THAT FRIENDDDDD :)

> [{quoted}](name=Cyberfehore4011,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=K8fgFcJu,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2017-06-13T15:01:09.112+0000)
>
> Of course i can! Do u have a skype or something? i have in my last 20 GAMES 5 BOT LANES THAT DID THAT FRIENDDDDD :)

No u dont friend. Your match history is public. Everyone can see it. Your last 20 games bot lanes score (adc will be first, support 2nd):

-6:5:7 , 4/7/8  -together 10:12:15
-3:6:4, 1:6:3 - together 4:12:7
-8:7:10, 1:8:23 together 9:15:33
-5:6:4, 5:2:12 together 10:8:16
-4:7:10, 1:7:11 together 5:14:21
-2:3:1, 0:5:1 together 2:8:2
-6:2:7, 4:3:17 together 10:5:24
-9:12:17, 1:8:30 together 10:20:47
-7:5:4, 5:6:15 together 12:11:19
-3:4:4, 1:7:4 together 4:11:8
-3:8:12, 7:6:12 together 10:14:24
-0:4:0, 1:5:1 together 1:9:1
-3:7:6, 0:5:13 together 3:12:19
-4:2:5, 2:6:8 together 6:8:13
-2:8:1, 0:7:3 together 2:15:4
-3:4:1, 2:14:5 -This is the worst case, still no 0:15, toghether 5:19:6
-8:4:18, 1:7:26 together 9:11:44
-2:2:5, 3:3:6 together 5:5:11
-9:1:5, 2:2:10 together 11:3:15
-11:3:15, 3:4:22 together 14:7:37


Thats your last 20 games. Not even 1 0:15 game and in most of these games KDA is positive (assists count too)

> [{quoted}](name=Cyberfehore4011,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=K8fgFcJu,comment-id=000200000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-06-13T15:41:54.527+0000)
>
> Lmao man, i see a lot of times bot is feeding, yes i did exaggerate but at the end they are the problem, please get off my  forum! your not making sense and honestly this is irritating talking to a 2 year old. Id like someone who CAN actually help me, not your profound opinion.  ALso i dont wanna be your friend either. trust me people like you are just annoying to be around with ^^

Ah well, i see you are lost cause. Good luck.

It's comments like "this is irritating talking to a 2 year old" and "people like you are just annoying to be around with" that a) don't make grammatical sense, and b) are the reason your main account got banned.

Have fun getting another ban if you keep blaming everyone except yourself.
No, i do point mistakes like overstaying, not backing out, lack map awareness, Minion pressure. but they people im playing with dont even have common sense...

Dude, it's not necessarily what you say but how and when you say it.

If you grief the entire game over one mistake using the tone you do here, you'll keep getting banned.

Nahhhh i feel like im obligated to talk how ever i want because i did "reform" i took a break, i started to be less toxic but when starting a new account and getting placed in bronze, most poeple dont understand that Elo hell is real and unless RIOT fixs QUEUE then there will always be this problem.
Elo hell isn't a thing.  Anyone who deserves to be out of bronze has generally been able to do so
Lmao please iv been doing amazing in my games recently... i cant carry trash... 1v5 is not possible anymore in assassin meta.,
Nope, until Riot bans your new account there will always be this problem.
I don't know how on point your roams can be if your bot lane goes 0/15 without you putting a stop to it.
Oh mannnnnnn... I have 3 perfect clips of me roaming bot, Pinging about 1 thousand times, and they dont go in. I just stopped help bot because everyone down dont help!

3 perfect clips of roaming play, 10 games with bot feeders. 

So are you getting the connection here?

Climbing isn't about making a good play here and there, but being able to consistently make those plays throughout your games. 

3 Good roams / game sounds about right.

You are shafting your own success here if you aren't achieving that.

oh is that so.

ask yourself the question on how you can control your lane so you can roam more, try to implement it as tell me what happens.

also, your mid lane win ratio is 23%. you are also only bronze 3/bronze2. If you are gold as you claim, you should have no problems climbing back out. I'm a silver5 support main and i managed to climb out of bronze this season with moderate effort, a goldielocks mid like yourself should have no problems  controlling your lane and roaming.

so something is very fishy here.  or maybe you were just boosted to gold with your flexQ buddies last season and now you think you belong there.

i fail to see how you thought u roasted me with that. 

but whatever floats your boat.
I really don't think that's how that works
Who are all these hat people? "if all the hatters..."

I don't know, but I think they tend to go 10/6 and brag about it

http://www.alice-in-wonderland.net/wp-content/uploads/mad-hatter-1.jpg
